string.text: Welcome to ZLM - ZCP Loot Module revised 2.0 settings page. This mod allows the game to spawn *additionnal* items (additionnaly to the item spawning by the base game or other mods) on NPCs or stashes, even the unmarked ones. Depending on the settings, the mod can either helps the player getting some more loot, or just destroy the game's economy if tweaked generously. Be advised : the more item that spawns, the more the game may lag, stutter or crash. Your greed is the only limit, wink.
You're not in-game. Any changes made now will apply when starting a new game, but will be overwritten if a savefile you load has a saved configuration.
You're in-game. Any changes made now will be saved and loaded together with your savefile.

Disclaimer : This mod was created by extracting and using the loot module from ZCP - Zone Customisation Project as a base and expanding its feature. All credits of the original functionnalities go to its original creator, Diphenhydramine-HCI. You can find the full original mod here :
Enable ZLM - ZCP Loot Module revised 2.0 (main)
Overrides loading configuration from savefile. Useful if you suspect the stored data is corrupted or otherwise invalid.

While in-game, changing settings in here may or may not have immediate effects. Below you can find which settings will have its effects immediately changing or not. Saving then re-loading a save will be necessery for the settings written in red to apply :
Enabling or editing functionnalities : ZLM (main), NPC spawn (main), Stash spawn(main), per category spawn, per category spawn chances, tier thresholds and debug logging.
Disabling any major spawn functionnality : ZLM (main), NPC spawn (main), Stash spawn (main).
